thig2.4:1.3: That townsman having given a price,
thig2.4:1.4: he set me aside for half the price.
thig2.4:2.1: There I was disenchanted by form,
thig2.4:2.3: May I not be reborn again in saṁsāra,
thig2.4:2.5: Realized are the three higher knowledges,
thig2.4:2.6: done is the teaching of the Buddha.
